00018 #ifndef GUARD_DELEGATE_LIST_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 #define GUARD_DELEGATE_LIST_HPP_INCLUDED 1
00020 
00021 #include <deque>
00022 #include "AlgorithmExt.hpp"
00023 #include "../DelegateN/DelegateBase.hpp"
00024 
00027 namespace DL
00028 {
00029   class DelegateList
00030   {
00031     public:
00032     virtual ~DelegateList()
00033     {
00034       stdext::foreach( m_obj_list , std::ptr_fun(operator delete) );
00035     }
00036     void add(DelegateObj  m_obj)
00037     { 
00038        m_obj_list.push_back(m_obj.release()); 
00039     }
00040     void reverse_call()
00041     {
00042       stdext::foreach_reverse(m_obj_list, std::mem_fun(&DelegateBase::Invoke));
00043     }
00044     void call()
00045     {
00046        stdext::foreach(m_obj_list ,std::mem_fun(&DelegateBase::Invoke));  
00047     }
00050     void operator()()
00051     {  
00052       stdext::foreach( m_obj_list , std::mem_fun(&DelegateBase::Invoke));
00053     }  
00054     private:
00055     std::deque<DelegateBase*> m_obj_list;
00056   };
00057 } // namespace DL
00058 
00059 #endif // GUARD_DELEGATE_LIST_HPP_INCLUDED
